title: Google’s January 2025 Update for Pixel Devices Finally Addresses an Annoying Issue
description: It only took a few months. The post Google’s January 2025 Update for Pixel Devices Finally Addresses an Annoying Issue appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: It only took a few months.
text: A while back, we noted how some users were experiencing a weird quirk on their Pixel 9 Pro XL units, which caused a line to momentarily flash across the display in seemingly random moments. With that in mind, it looks like Google has finally taken notice of the complaints with the January 2025 update for Pixel devices. READ: The Pixel 9 Pro XL has a Serious Screen Issue According to Google, the update fixes the flashing line problem for Pixel 9 series devices in addition to several other issues, including themed icon colors with the Pixel launcher, audio delay and stability, and issues when using a connected camera. The update is available for several Pixel devices including the Pixel 6 series, Pixel 7 series, Pixel 8 series, and the Pixel 9 series devices, as well as the Pixel Fold and Pixel tablet. Just recently, Google announced that it would be pushing out an update for the discontinued Pixel 4a, albeit with a possible effect on battery life. With that said though, the company is offering users affected by the update compensation via store credit. Users can check out the new update by heading into Settings > System > Software Updates > System update. A writer and content creator with a love for tech and music, Mike is also an avid gamer as well. He and his wife are big fans of Mario Kart. html:
A while back, we noted how some users were experiencing a weird quirk on their Pixel 9 Pro XL units, which caused a line to momentarily flash across the display in seemingly random moments. With that in mind, it looks like Google has finally taken notice of the complaints with the January 2025 update for Pixel devices.

READ: The Pixel 9 Pro XL has a Serious Screen Issue

According to Google, the update fixes the flashing line problem for Pixel 9 series devices in addition to several other issues, including themed icon colors with the Pixel launcher, audio delay and stability, and issues when using a connected camera. The update is available for several Pixel devices including the Pixel 6 series, Pixel 7 series, Pixel 8 series, and the Pixel 9 series devices, as well as the Pixel Fold and Pixel tablet.

Just recently, Google announced that it would be pushing out an update for the discontinued Pixel 4a, albeit with a possible effect on battery life. With that said though, the company is offering users affected by the update compensation via store credit.

Users can check out the new update by heading into Settings > System > Software Updates > System update.

A writer and content creator with a love for tech and music, Mike is also an avid gamer as well. He and his wife are big fans of Mario Kart.
